divs: Sighting Detailsout in the back field taking pictures of the sun setting and found this picture, i did not see it with the naked eye it was only when i started to look at the pictures and found this one picture with the object in the sky no other pictuers taken of that same area has the object
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Yardley
